items.title: Tata Motors, Motherson, Sona BLW, other shares rally as Trump hints at exemption on imported parts and vehicles
items.description: Trump said in a statement that he’s ‘looking to help some of the car companies’ that are in the process of shifting production back to the US from countries like Mexico and Canada.

items.title: Why this retailer looks set for a rerating
items.description: With the transition from unorganised to organised retail in affordable fashion, Cantabil Retail is well-positioned to leverage its extensive national presence and expanding digital footprint

items.title: Is this the year to avoid equities?
items.description: As the market gyrates on tariff tantrums, investors need to be patient and learn when to grab the lows

items.title: Agri Picks Report April 15, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Sowing of rabi crops in Telangana was at 7.8 million acres (1 acre = 0.4 hectares) as of Wednesday, up 15.4% on year from 6.8 million acres a year ago, according to a report released by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Bajaj Housing Finance stock gains 3% as one-year lock-in expires, over 500 crore shares shares available to trade
items.description: Over 500 crore shares or around 64 percent of the total equity in the firm will be freed up. However, this doesn't mean investors will offload their holdings, its just been unlocked for trade.

items.title: Ircon International shares up 3% on LoA worth Rs 127 crore from North Western Railway
items.description: Ircon International Share Price | The contract value is Rs 127 crore, which is to be executed in 24 months from the date of issue of LOA.

items.title: Zydus Lifesciences shares gain on USFDA approval for Deflazacort tablets
items.description: Zydus Lifesciences Share Price | Deflazacort is a corticosteroid indicated for the treatment of Duchenne muscular dystrophy (DMD) in patients 5 years of age and older.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex gains 1,600 pts, Nifty above 23,300; regains all losses since April 2
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Tata Motors, HDFC Bank, Bharti Airtel, L&T, M&M are among major gainers on the Nifty. BSE Midcap and smallcap indices up 1 percent each. All the sectoral indices are trading in the green.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The Foreign institutional investors (FIIs) extended their selling on ninth day on April 11 as they sold equities worth Rs 2519 crore, however, Domestic institutional investors (DIIs) bought equities of Rs 3759 crore on same day.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Zydus Lifesciences, Ashoka Buildcon, Nureca, Cyient, Ahluwalia Contracts, Transrail Lighting, Swiggy in focus on 15 April
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 15 Apr: Stocks like NCL Industries, Persistent Systems, Repco Home Finance, JK Cement, Canara Bank, Union Bank of India, and Yatra Online will be in focus on April 15.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Valor Estate, Cholamandalam Financial, ITC, Clean Science, Deepak Fertilisers, Gujarat Gas, and others on April 15?
items.description: The market mood is likely to remain upbeat in the upcoming session. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Vedanta shares surge 3% on talks with Assam CM over Rs 50,000 crore investment plan
items.description: Vedanta Group Chairman Anil Agarwal had shared the group's plan to invest Rs 50,000 crore in Assam and Tripura's oil and gas sector over next 3-4 years.

items.title: Vodafone Idea is a 'high-risk buy', shares can rally 67% to Rs 12: Citi Research
items.description: Citi Research maintained its positive outlook on Vodafone Idea, as well as Indus Towers, betting on further subscriber additions.

items.description: Net Sales are expected to increase by 17.9 percent Y-o-Y (down 2.7 percent Q-o-Q) to Rs. 430.8 crore, according to PL Capital.

items.title: Ajanta Pharma shares gain after Jefferies initiates coverage with 'Buy' call, sees 11% upside
items.description: Jefferies initiated coverage with a 'Buy' rating and a target price of Rs 2,850, citing strong execution, a focused branded generics strategy, and robust earnings growth.

items.title: Broader markets shine as small and midcap indices surge 2% on hopes of tariff reprieve, sustained inflows
items.description: "While the bulls seem to hold the current momentum, intraday volatility and profit booking near resistance zones remain likely. Traders are advised to remain cautious near upper resistance levels and consider buying on dips toward key support zones," said Mandar Bhojane, Research Analyst at Choice Broking.

items.title: Macrotech shares rally 7% as Lodha brothers settle dispute, BSE Realty index outperforms
items.description: Abhishek Lodha, who runs Macrotech Developers, had filed a brand infringement suit in January 2025 against his brother Abhinandan Lodha and his firm over the alleged use of the 'Lodha' brand name.

items.description: Banking stocks surged after several state-run and private lenders cut fixed deposit and savings rates in response to the RBI’s recent repo rate reduction.

items.title: Earnings expectations sway IREDA, ICICI Lombard shares higher by 5%, ICICI Pru up 2%
items.description: Financial results of several broader companies will be analysed for their exposure to US, and impact of swings in raw material prices, at a time when an ongoing tariff war is engulfing business outlook, especially for exported-oriented plays.
